entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2021-10-25
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [Bug] ScrollView doesn't center a child if the child has Shadow defined #3106
  • [Bug] iOS device test visual runner CollectionView crash #3104
  • [Bug] Unexpected behavior when InvalidateMeasure is invoked in Android #3102
  • Clean up the namespaces #3101
    6.0.200-preview.11
  • [Bug] Simple arithmetic operations taken too much in maui platform #3100
  • [Bug] Workload ID maui is not recognized - Unable to find even a single workload #3099

Closed

  • [Bug] iOS Placeholder displays on top of Editor #2922
  • [Bug] Test FontAutoScalingEnabled once spans are implemented #1793
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Bug] Rework SetVirtualView so when called via the interface it won't call the abstract SetVirtualView #1213
  • [Bug] Provide hook on WinUI Gestures for users to set PreventGestureBubbling #1572

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix mappers so if they are accessed early on it doesn't effect the remapping #3109
  • Ensure measure is invalidated when AbsoluteLayout bounds are updated #3108
  • [core] do not configure loggers by default on mobile #3107

Merged

  • Fix placeholder on iOS Editor so it doesn't overlap when text is present when text is set in code #3086
    area/controls 🎮
  • [build] Add maui-blazor to vs-workload.props #3105
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/setup 🪄

Updated

  • Implement .NET 6 features for templates. #3018
    area/templates 📄, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Android] CollectionView handler for android #3067
    do-not-merge, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • [Android] Update SecureStorage to use EncryptedSharedPreferences #2807
    6.0.101-preview.10
  • Multi Window Support #2811
    area/desktop 🖥️, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • Move `IDispatcher` logic out of `IPlatformServices` #2862
    area/controls 🎮, 6.0.101-preview.10
  • [WinUI] Implement SearchBar IsTextPredictionEnabled property #2911
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮
  • Adds Tizen backend #2360
    area/setup 🪄
